short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy and quick search for Recipes in the browser address bar and browser action modal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install our extension to set RecipeSearches (powered by yahoo) as your default search engine and customize your new tab, giving you instant access to thousands of recipes with every search.

With this extension, you can easily configure RecipeSearches as your go-to search engine and personalize your browser's new tab, making it easier to discover and save your favorite recipes.

By clicking "Add to Chrome," you consent to installing the RecipeSearches extension to change your default search engine to RecipeSearches (powered by Yahoo Search). By installing, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

You can use the extension icon to search for recipes or also type RecipeSearches and hit tab to search of recipes on the address bar of the browser

Get RecipeSearches to explore delicious recipes and inspire your culinary adventures daily. Like other search engines, we generate revenue from advertisements, but we focus on bringing you the best recipe content.

Please feel free to reach out anytime: recipesearches@gmail.com
